entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Winnipeg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg Richardson Int'l Airport 09:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %

Dewpoint: -7.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
